About.p1: I am Alexander Peccin, passionate about music, nature and technology. With over 10 years of experience in IT, 5 of which are dedicated to programming, I've worked in more than 20 projects.
About.p2: Currently, I focus on Frontend development, specializing in frameworks such as React and NextJS, while also bringing a strong background in Backend (Node) and communication skills to collaborate across different project areas.
About.p3: My goal is to be part of a team where I can learn from and contribute to challenges that motivate me to grow, and advance towards becoming a Full Stack Engineer.
About.p4: I believe that continuous learning and teamwork are essential for developing impactful solutions, and I am always seeking new knowledge and growth opportunities.

Projects.compliance: For compliance reasons, some repositories cannot be shared
